FuncDef: The lcd command changes the local working directory of an FTP client.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the destination directory.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-insensitive characters without a blank space.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By executing the lcd command displays the local working directory of FTP client. By executing the pwd command displays the remote working directory of FTP server, which is different from lcd command.
